name: opensearch-dashboards
description: OpenSearch Dashboards is an open source visualization tool for OpenSearch that lets you search, visualize, and analyze your data with a variety of charts, maps, and tables.
values:
# OpenSearch Dashboards configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/opensearch-project/helm-charts/blob/main/charts/opensearch-dashboards/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## OpenSearch Dashboards settings
opensearchDashboards:
  ## OpenSearch Dashboards image settings
  image:
    repository: opensearchproject/opensearch-dashboards
    tag: "2.16.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  ## Number of OpenSearch Dashboards replicas
  replicas: 1
  
  ## Resources settings
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
  
  ## Configuration for OpenSearch Dashboards
  config:
    # URL of the OpenSearch instance to connect to
    opensearch.hosts: ["https://opensearch-cluster:9200"]
    
    # Server configuration
    server:
      host: "0.0.0.0"
      port: 5601
      
    # Telemetry settings
    telemetry.optIn: false
    
    # Security settings
    opensearch.ssl.verificationMode: none
    
    # Saved objects settings
    savedObjects.maxImportPayloadBytes: 26214400
  
  ## Service settings
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 5601
    annotations: {}
  
  ## Ingress settings
ingress:
    enabled: false
    annotations: {}
      # kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
      # kubernetes.io/tls-acres: "true"
    hosts:
      - host: dashboards.example.local
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: Prefix
    tls: []
  
  ## Environment variables
  environment: {}
  
  ## Liveness probe settings
  livenessProbe:
    enabled: true
    initialDelaySeconds: 30
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 5
    failureThreshold: 3
    successThreshold: 1
  
  ## Readiness probe settings
  readinessProbe:
    enabled: true
    initialDelaySeconds: 5
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 5
    failureThreshold: 3
    successThreshold: 1

## Security context
securityContext: {}
  # runAsUser: 1000
  # runAsGroup: 1000
  # fsGroup: 1000

## Service account
serviceAccount:
  create: true
  name: ""

## Pod security context
podSecurityContext: {}
  # fsGroup: 1000

## Node selector
nodeSelector: {}

## Tolerations
tolerations: []

## Affinity
affinity: {}

## Priority class
priorityClassName: ""

## Topology spread constraints
topologySpreadConstraints: []

## Extra volumes
extraVolumes: []

## Extra volume mounts
extraVolumeMounts: []

## Metrics settings
metrics:
  enabled: false
  serviceMonitor:
    enabled: false

## Init containers
initContainers: []
